system.description: Starting at 1st level, you have acquired an embedded artifact. It incorporates itself into your body, manifesting as a glowing crystal, web of vines, or similar mineral or vegetable appearance and cannot be taken from you while you live. Whenever you finish a long rest, you can choose whether your artifact will be an @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.l97xnqcpxnc12jpo]{Armor of Power}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.uga2gmf3559332tw]{Weapon of Power}, or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.00ein6jo2oc0asex]{Font of Power}, at which point it will form in a manner appropriate to the selected form, typically manifesting as a collection of wood, stone, gems, bones, antlers, vines, and/or similar natural materials. It remains in that form until you make a different choice. You can freely choose relic arts and artifact whispers that require any of these bonded artifact types, but they only function while the artifact is in the corresponding form.
